pages.name: Cyclops
pages.text: $(#734608)A $(thing)cyclops$()$(#734608) is a giant distinguished by its large singular eye and small horn on top of its head

$(#734608)Cyclopes are found living in cyclops coves, large stone domes housing sheep pens near beaches. They may also rarely wander plains and savannas$(br2)They will let out a loud, rumbling roar before rushing their enemy.$(br)It has a powerful stomp and kick, but it will also decaptitate enemies by biting off their heads resulting in almost guaranteed death

$(#734608)Despite attacking almost anything within its sight, it will not attack livestock as they tend to raise and take care of them$(br2)In fact, they are so instinctually good at shepherding sheep that any nearby sheep will start to follow them$(br2)One should exercise extreme caution that they do $(o)not$()$(#734608) attack a cyclops' flock of sheep

$(#734608)One can wear a full set of $(item)sheep disguise armor$()$(#734608) while sneaking near it to avoid detection. Wounding the $(item)cyclops' eye$()$(#734608) will also severely reduce its detection range to nearly its melee reach$(br2)Managing to kill a cyclops will drop mutton, leather, wool, occasionally a $(item)cyclops eye$()$(#734608), and rarely its skull$(br2)Its eye can be held to inflict weakness to nearby monsters
